mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM ROWNO, A.*, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOT_CNT FROM ( SELECT TBDCMIAM005M.CD_GRP_ID, TBDCMIAM005M.CD_GRP_NM, TBDCMIAM005M.CD_GRP_DES FROM TBDCMIAM005M AND TBDCMIAM005M.CD_GRP_NM like '%'||#{searchSelectedValue}||'%' AND TBDCMIAM005M.CD_GRP_DES like '%'||#{searchSelectedValue}||'%' ) A )B WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN (((#{currPage}- 1) * #{pageSize}) + 1) AND (#{currPage} * #{pageSize})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBDCMIAM005M (CD_GRP_ID, CD_GRP_NM, CD_GRP_DES) VALUES (#{IdValue}, #{codeGroupName}, #{codeGroupDesc})
mapper.select: SELECT TBDCMIAM005M.CD_GRP_ID, TBDCMIAM005M.CD_GRP_NM, TBDCMIAM005M.CD_GRP_DES FROM TBDCMIAM005M
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBDCMIAM006D (CMM_CD_ID, CMM_CD_NM, CD_GRP_ID, CMM_CD_DES, CD_RNK) VALUES (#{IdValue}, #{codeName}, #{codeManagerId}, #{codeDesc}, #{codeWeight})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBDCMIAM005M WHERE CD_GRP_NM = #{codeGroupName}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBDCMIAM006D WHERE CMM_CD_NM = #{codeName}

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM ROWNO, A.*, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOT_CNT FROM ( SELECT TBDCMIAM006D.CMM_CD_ID, TBDCMIAM006D.CMM_CD_NM, TBDCMIAM006D.CMM_CD_DES, TBDCMIAM006D.CD_RNK, TBDCMIAM006D.CD_GRP_ID, TBDCMIAM005M.CD_GRP_DES FROM TBDCMIAM006D, TBDCMIAM005M AND TBDCMIAM006D.CD_GRP_ID = TBDCMIAM005M.CD_GRP_ID AND TBDCMIAM005M.CD_GRP_DES like '%#||#{searchSelectedValue}||'%' AND TBDCMIAM006D.CMM_CD_NM like '%'||#{searchSelectedValue}||'%' AND TBDCMIAM006D.CMM_CD_DES like '%'||#{searchSelectedValue}||'%' ) A )B WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN (((#{currPage}- 1) * #{pageSize}) + 1) AND (#{currPage} * #{pageSize})
